TEI:
@xml:id="CHOB_19240404 [Letter from Carolie Hobson to Leonard Woolf, 04 04 1924]: a machine readable transcription A letter from Carolie Hobson to Leonard woolf, providing the thanking Leonard Woolf Letter from Coralie Hobson to Leonard Woolf, 4 April 1924.
Carolie Hobson Creation of machine-readable version: Julia Blomberg
Conversion to TEI-conformant markup: Julia Blomberg Editorial annotations: Julia Blomberg
56 Cartwright Gardens
w.e.l. April 4 1924
West East London 4 April 1924
Leonard Woolf Cartwright Gardens 56
Dear sir,
I Thank you for your letter of the
1st month and would confirm that I
would like you to publish the book for
me on the terms which you support:
I take it therefore that you will
how prepare a formal entrant which I
shall be glad to recieve at your convenience.
I also thank you for your specimen
which appears to me to the satisfactory,
and which I now return
I suggest as a little fun the book 'smoke rings'
Yours faithfully,
Coralie Hobson
